thread.title: Lisa Marie Presley's estranged husband fights claims | Daily Mail Online

author: Martin Gould For Dailymail.Com
title: Lisa Marie Presley's estranged husband fights claims | Daily Mail Online

organizations.name: department of children and family services

text: show ad EXCLUSIVE: 'She cares more about destroying me than her own kids.' Ex of ‘vindictive’ Lisa Marie Presley hits back at claims she found ‘disturbing’ pictures of children on his computer, promising bombshell revelations about her Michael Lockwood claims Lisa Marie Presley broke court rules by revealing claims that he is being investigated over the improper pictures ‘It is particularly distasteful that (she) has placed more value on trying to damage my reputation than on the fact that her false statements may be brought to our daughters’ attention' He said there are also bombshell allegations against her ‘For the time being I will not say anything else about such statements...other than that the allegations against both of us have not been unproven' While she's crying poverty, Lockwood claimed she still receives $466,000 a month — $5.6 million a year — from the trust Elvis set up for his only child Daughters Finley and Harper Lockwood are in the care of California's Department of Children and Family Services, court documents state The court papers also state there are pending allegations of sexual abuse and neglect Published: 20:58 GMT, 17 February 2017 | Updated: 01:43 GMT, 18 February 2017 289 shares
